nodes.text: Fell Dargun was a male Human who lived at the time of the Cold War on Tatooine. He had a Gamorrean gladiator by the name of Borga in his servitude.

Fell Dargun was a male Human who was in the gladiator business. At some point, he acquired a Gamorrean by the name of Borga, and had him fight under his name. In 3643 BBY, Borga fought a bounty hunter at the Lady of Pain's compound, but was defeated. Dargun expressed his grief, and promised the Lady that he would return with a new, victorious gladiator.
